root.name: Fantasy Aquarium World
root.description: OverviewFantasy Aquarium World is a game where you manage a virtual fish tank. The game is to be released on May 8, 2009 and is developed by Destineer.GameplayThe gameplay revolves around the player picking one of six aquariums, picking your fish, and making sure they are fed and stay alive. The game includes over 30 species of fish.You can choose from six aquariums of different sizes for raising your selected fish and six additional isolation tanks to maintain balance. There are more than 30 tank decorations that can make your tank unique and influence fish behavior. If you select an incorrect combination of fish, they will fight.
